item.title: How to Handle Unbalanced Classes
item.description: In machine learning, working with unbalanced classes can be challenging. Unbalanced classes occurs when there's an unequal representation of classes, where the minority class is often of higher interest to us. This is prominent in areas where data collection of the minority classes is difficult due to time and cost …
item.dc:creator: Audrey Chan

item.title: 你好世界! Visualizing Top Spoken Languages with Altair
item.description: It's been three weeks into my Data Science immersive bootcamp and I'm having a blast coding again! I'm starting to get used to Python and new libraries (pandas, numpy, altair, etc.). If you're like me and you've previously programmed in other languages like C/Java, when learning any new language …
item.dc:creator: Audrey Chan
